snippet: Teenagers under 17 would be able to get suntans only the old-fashioned way under a bill working is way through the New York State Legislature.
abstract: Bill working its way through the New York State Legislature would prohibit anyone 16 or younger from using an indoor tanning booths; bill's supporters cite evidence that excessive exposure to UV radiation can cause skin cancer.
lead_paragraph: Teenagers under 17 would be able to get suntans only the old-fashioned way under a bill working is way through the New York State Legislature.

headline.seo: Albany Bill to Ban Indoor Tanning by Teenagers Under 17
headline.main: Parlors Face Age-Limit Bill Over Tanning by Teenagers
headline.print_headline: Parlors Face Age-Limit Bill Over Tanning By Teenagers
